os.fullname: Classic 8-bit Operating Systems (Apple, Atari, Commodore, etc.)
os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: Classic 8-bit Operating Systems (Apple, Atari, Commodore, etc.)

name: Winc64
short_description:
Winc64 aims to be a modern, native 16-bit, event-driven operating system for the SuperCPU-powered Commodore 64 as emulated in VICE.  Winc64 will feature effortless high-speed disk access, mouse and keyboard control, and high-resolution proportional text using an interface similar to modern pc operating systems.  All features will be integrated into a custom VICE SuperCPU ROM.

Winc64 is written in 100% 65816 assembly language using the excellent 64Tass assembler by Soci, also available on Sourceforge.

Currently in pre-alpha stage.
summary: A Modern Operating System for the VICE Commodore 64 SuperCPU
